{"blocks":[{"key":"8ehjc","text":"Sacrifice mice using Isofluorine ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72mqk","text":"(do not use cervical dislocation as this might affect perfusion of the brain)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1e13s","text":"Make an incision in the skin with fine scissors about a couple of millimeters above the orifice. From this opening the incision must continue on the mid ventral side up to the chin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqn9e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o7t1","text":"Perform transcardial perfusion via the left ventricle with    / mouse","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fp3bs","text":" at a perfusion rate of 2 mL/min for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"98E2C567EE3F11EC8EAC0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"Ice-cold PBS","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"69l8t","text":"If cervical lymph nodes are needed disect them now, otherwise remove the Head and harvest Brain regions of interest and collect all Brains in   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":142,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ronr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"098EBDB0EE4011EC8F58BFF44A3E67E3","id":0,"label":"Ice-cold DMEM, genta","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a6lta","text":"If lymph nodes are also analysed    and repeat for up to 5 mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"animf","text":"If only brain ECs are analysed a total of 2 mice should suffice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jkga","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3F667680EE4011EC8F58BFF44A3E67E3","id":0,"step_guid":"DEDF9360EE3E11EC8F58BFF44A3E67E3","title":""}}}}
